duties_responsibilities.duty: Installation, repairs, testing, and modification of line and station telephone equipment.
Inspection of subscriber premises and testing of newly installed telephone equipment.
Working closely with the Dispatch Center for work assignments and recording transmission readings.
Installing and maintaining subscriber PairGain Devices, Fiber to the prem data and telephone services, and Data and station wiring.
Refurbishing cable and installing facilities within pedestals and terminals.
Climbing ladders, bucket trucks, and repairing or replacing defective lines and auxiliary equipment.
Observing safety rules and regulations, correcting prints, and maintaining as-builts.
Locating buried telephone and Fiber cables, and troubleshooting high-speed internet and data networks.
Conveying a positive and professional appearance and demeanor when communicating the company’s products and services to customers.
Actively supporting sales and marketing related activities, and assisting other technical personnel in the performance of their duties.
